main event: A red to orange object, slightly larger than a baseball, was spotted at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet near Valley City, North Dakota in December 1956.
interesting points: The object had rapid movements up, down, sideways, and hovered.
When a police car approached the object, it rapidly disappeared to the west.
The police officers reported losing radio contact with the local station when they tried to get closer to the object, which was considered very unusual.
All radio contact was regained after the object left the area.
An additional witness, Loren Anderson, a policeman from Valley City, North Dakota, also observed the object.
sighted object: one red to orange object, slightly larger than a baseball
